text.content:
Bone Masher

Normal damage. Crit Effect: Either the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -10-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot status penalty to your land Speed} or is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and can't use one of its arms (your choice). Either effect last until healed.

Bludgeoning

Punctured Lung

Crit Effect: The target is Suffocating until subject to magical healing.

Piercing

Pain and Simple

Triple damage.

Slashing

Hypnotic Link

If this is a spell, the target takes normal damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Controlled]{Controlled} by you until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell
